snippet.title: Battle Gear Flash Game Playthrough - Gameplay Feature
snippet.description:
Battle Gear is a classic flash game by Bubblebox where you train units to fight in a head to head war.  You unlock more units pretty quickly, and have a variety of battles.  Air, water, land, a possible combination of any so your strategy must change!

It does get pretty repetitive after a while so I played this one for around 30 minutes.  It's far too long to play the entire thing, it was worth the nostalgia trip.
